item.title: Hanes Sport Men’s XTemp Training Pants, Men’s Workout Pants With Pockets, Men’s Athletic Pants

X-Temp™ performance training pants are engineered to adapt to your body temperature and activity level, keeping you comfortable. Cool Comfort™ fabric wicks away ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:53:57 UTC – Details)


You put in the sweat. Let Hanes® do the rest. Hanes Sport men’s activewear is designed to keep you fresher – no matter how long the workout. X-Temp performance training pants are engineered to adapt to your body temperature and activity level, keeping you comfortable. Cool Comfort fabric wicks away sweat while Cool DRI technology speeds drying. An elastic waistband and built-in quick cord adjust for the perfect fit. The result? You can focus on your training without the distraction of uncomfortable clothing. Featuring an open-bottom hem and convenient side pockets to stash your stuff, these pants are ready to work – or not – just as hard as you are.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13 x 8 x 1 inches; 5.6 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ O5A08
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 6, 2016
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Hanes Men’s Athletic Child Code
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01L9H8J46

Imported
Machine Wash
HANES SPORT – Performance. Style. Comfort. Hanes Sport apparel builds on our comfort heritage with innovative technologies to give you the looks that fit your life, your sport, and your style.
STAY COOL – XTemp technology is engineered to adapt to your activity level and body temperature, keeping you cooler and drier all day.
MOISTURE-WICKING PANTS – Cool Comfort fabric wicks sweat away to help you stay cooler.
FAST DRYING – This men’s activewear features Cool DRI technology that dries fabric faster so you stay more comfortable.

Hanes® EcoSmart™ mid-weight, year-round fleece sweats are made with cotton sourced from American farms, so you can feel good about your choice. Thick fleece is made with a quality cotton/polyester blend that stays warm and cozy, so jogger pants ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $10.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:11:57 UTC – Details)


Just-right men’s joggers let you take leisure seriously while staying versatile. Hanes® EcoSmart mid-weight, year-round fleece sweats are made with cotton sourced from American farms, so you can feel good about your choice. Thick fleece is made with a quality cotton/polyester blend that stays warm and cozy, so jogger pants can be a longtime favorite. Whether you’re kicking back or warming up for game day, these comfortable sweatpants for men have a relaxed, athletic fit that gets the job done. Side-seam pockets and single back pocket hold essentials, freeing up your hands. Throw these men’s sweatpants in the washer on laundry day for easy care. Use cold water wash to reduce energy use. Love this men’s activewear? Grab one in every color to maximize your style options.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13 x 8 x 1 inches; 12.32 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ O8389
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 18, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Hanes
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07HDLM9TC

Imported
Pull On closure
Machine Wash
FASHION TO FEEL GOOD ABOUT – Hanes EcoSmart mid-weight, year-round fleece sweats are made with cotton sourced from American farms.
SOFT, PLUSH, AND STURDY – Thick fleece men’s activewear stays warm and cozy, so they can be a longtime favorite.
RELAXED SILHOUETTE – For warming up, cooling down, or kicking back, these men’s joggers have a relaxed fit.
